website_summaries.verdict: With all the features you could ask for in a charming design, this sturdy 4-slice toaster offers great value for the money.
pros: Delivers all the most sought after Cuisinart toaster features
Modes include Defrost, Reheat, Bagel options
Separate control panels simultaneously accommodate individual toasting preferences
Beautiful brushed stainless steel design manages to achieve a classic old-school appeal without feeling dated
Available in a variety of colors
cons: Even though it has zero impact on performance, certain colors cost quite a bit more than others

customer_reviews.title: Just the pop of color needed...plus it makes perfect toast!!
customer_reviews.text: As with all of my other Cuisinart appliances, this one is awesome, and it looks great too!! Didn't know what to do with this deep corner in my new kitchen - when shopping for a new toaster to replace a well used older Cuisinart model, this caught my eye. My husband called me at work to make sure I really ordered a red toaster - once I placed it in the corner - he got it!!
customer_reviews.author: PKHolden

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you like your toast black on one side and not toasted on the other
customer_reviews.text: 1. The controls are difficult to set. Maybe if I toasted a loaf of bread at one time and keep changing the settings it would be easy. 2. Toasted one side and the other side was hot - untoasted. 3 Another company that makes its products in a 3rd world country without quality control.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Almost just right
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight toaster that looks great on the counter. It makes beautiful toast with a wide range of settings. My only issue is the broad length of the slots. Some store bought loaves barely fit in the slots which means you have to "help" remove the toast even with the extra pushup in the popup mechanism. The same is true for home made breads with or without the use of an automatic bread making machine. Notwithstanding the above, it is a recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus

customer_reviews.title: Check Setting Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this toaster at first but if I was just toasting a single slice using the recommended slot on the right it would only toast one side of the bread. It was like it was using the bagel setting which only toasts one side even though I didn’t have it on the bagel setting. I tried to exchange it for a new one just in case that one was just defective but they were out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is lame.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is no better than the ones selling for $19.99. The temperature controls are so lame that you barely increase them and your toast burns, which in my case, sets off my smoke alarm and sends my dogs into hiding. The slots are not one bit wide, barely wide enough for an eggo. If I could give it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: I love this toaster for the way it looks and works
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster for the way it looks and works, but I find it hard to get a setting that gets the toast golden brown. (That's the only reason not 5 stars) I love the two separate toasters in one - they act individually from each other- and that comes in mighty handy. This is a great toaster, and it works well. I understand the cord is short for safety reasons...but isn't needing to use an extension cord even more unsafe? I wish the cord was longer, and the settings were more defined. Other than that, it's a treasure! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't toast on one side
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. Bagel setting adds time, does not work to toast one side. This is not like bagel settings I have seen in the past, and leaves you out of luck if you want to do any one-sided toasting. Now I can't use it easily for my fresh English muffins. Such a hassle to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Pavlik Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy at first because of the upvoted bad reviews, but it honestly works just fine. It does have somewhat of a burning plastic smell when in use that has faded away with use over the last few months. That sort of thing is rather standard with a lot of newly bought modern appliances like toasters and things I've noticed, so it wasn't really a worry. My parents have used this model of toaster for years, and it's always worked well. It toasts great, looks cool, and hasn't burnt my house down, so that's a 5/5 in my book.
customer_reviews.author: TheKnight_42

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: The can’t push the levers down unless you can bench press 120 Lbs. Once you get them down , good luck getting them to pop up. None of the buttons worked. I’m extremely disappointed. I own several Cuisinart appliances. I felt the price was high , but Cuisinart has always been a quality brand, so I purchased it. You’ve ruined my opinion of your craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and love the way it toasts
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new toaster and wanted one in red. This one is great with large slots, like having two in one with the four slots and easy to learn how to use it. Strong structure and really gorgeous red color. Love IT1
customer_reviews.author: VaVa49

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly - read the directions!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful toaster that looks great in my kitchen. Other similar toasters only had red on the sides; since I only really see the front of the toaster that was not practical. I've seen a lot of complaints about the actually toasting. Although there are four slots, if you are toasting a single slice of bread you are supposed to use the slot on the far right. There's even a little icon there to remind you. I'm assuming a lot of people are not following these directions. It toasts very evenly on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Quam

customer_reviews.title: Knobs feel chintzy.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even try it. I felt how loose and floppy the dials for adjusting toasting darkness were and just knew for 70 bux, this toaster isn't gonna make me feel ok with my purchase. Someone else said the same thing in the reviews and I should have taken heed. Other than that, it's a good looking toaster, but we don't keep ours out and I could tell every time I put it away, the toasting adjustments would end up moving due to how easily they turn.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Poor toasting ability
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement for old toaster that wasn't consistent in toasting. This unit is consistent. Consistently poor. Set the dial to max and kind of toasts. Set it to min and it kind of toasts. If you want anything darker than lightly browned toast, it needs to cycle twice. The dials themselves are very loose. It makes a clunky sound (sounds cheap) when it pops up. I can't recommend this product and am very disappointed in Cuisinart in their quality.
customer_reviews.author: A J Fio

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the toaster but the slots are not as wide as wide as I thought. Yes you can use it for bagels, waffles and toast but I wish it was a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Expecting a nicer “look and fee”.
customer_reviews.text: I think that from Cuisinart I was expecting a little nicer look and feel. The toaster works “ok”, but the mechanics for popping the toast feels cheap and I don’t expect it will last more than a few months. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Wieder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster and I love the color. My kitchen appliances are red and this fit perfectly. The toaster itself works well and the deep pockets are great for bagels too. Toasts perfectly. I put the toast level on 3, and anything else higher will be too much but to each his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was perfect. Mine has worked like a charm for 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these since 2012. When my sister wanted a red toaster for her housewarming gift, I thought it was perfect. Mine has worked like a charm for 6 years. The pop of color in this one serves more than function. It is pretty too :-)
customer_reviews.author: ROCHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It very pretty child safe Works great love the different settings for bread and or bagels
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bertino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great toaster! Love the reheat and cancel features! It does what it says, and is worth the money, it is expensive to me, for a toaster, but its great and works well, making it worth the investment, i dont see buying another toaster for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: mississippi

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the color. That's it. Bagel button stopped working after 9 months. Toaster does not get used that much. Maybe 2 or 3 times during the week and little more on the weekend. Very disappointing. Last Cuisinart lasted almost 10 years. This will be the last Cuisinart I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have a new toaster that works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and I didn't realize how bad my old one was till I got this one. This is a great one. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne

customer_reviews.title: Nice but.....
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed with this product, for the price I paid I expected it to work perfectly but of course it doesn't. No matter what setting I try it does not cook even on both sides as you would think it should this is why we bought a new toaster because our last one wasn't working so well. So frustrating !!
customer_reviews.author: Ritzct

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My old toaster bit the dust so it was time to buy a new one. I purchased this one to match the rest of the appliances in my kitchen. I have been very satisfied with the way it works. It is so nice to have brown crispy toast again. It also works great with frozen waffles. They don't feel mushy and partially cooked. They are actually cooked all the way through and lightly browned on the outside. LOVE this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very adjustable, lots of features! And wonderful red color!
customer_reviews.author: D. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best toaster ever. It takes a few times to get the settings right for the type of bread you are toasting. But after that toast perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Marie Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Very decent toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster. Don’t turn it up too high - really toasts which of course you want in a toaster. I ordered the red one- looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: sdughug

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: So fabulous. Love the red - matches all my other little counter appliances. I am still learning all the setting buttons and fried my first bagel, but it was user error. This is an amazing deal. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: DenverMom46

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart is hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this toaster that replaced our 15 year old Cuisinart toaster. The quality is what you would expect from this company. I erroneously answered another shopper’s question that our toaster has no crumb tray... it actually has two crumb trays making it very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toaster in candy apple red and stainless. Outstanding packaging for shipping. No flaws or shipment damage. I would highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Nice but outside gets hot
customer_reviews.text: It works and looks great. I'm giving it 4 stars because the outside is hot to the touch and would not recommend for people with children.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster!  Get it!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a toaster made by Waring (they make blenders, no?) - this toaster is superb. The Waring, well, it went south after the first two months; had it replaced under warranty. Then, a few months later, it went further south. Enough. This toaster, while costing $60 vs $30 for the Waring, well, there is little contest. Cuisinart is obviously better, and while I squandered $30 trying to save, I ended spending $90 for a great toaster and a movie prop.
customer_reviews.author: UT

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a toaster
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t toast on both sides. I have a reheat button, bagel button and defrost button but no toaster button. How can I use it for toast?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The knobs are VERY easy to turn, to the point that it feels like poor construction. But the functionality is not affected. I just don't know why it was designed this way, because if anything bumps into this thing, your setting will change. Seems fine other than that. Easier to clean than many other toasters that I've owned because of sufficient space in the inner grates.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty with the rest of the red appliances I have in the kitchen and it gets hot which is the reason I purchased. I burnt my toast the first couple times I tried so it takes a little adjusting to your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: ShaLonda Palmore II

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: We do not use a toaster much. It seems to do a good job but what I like most is that it looks good while doing everything that it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Jill Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design. Having the controls in the front is perfect. That’s why I wanted this one. The heating elements are about the same as any other toaster. I long for the old toasters from the 1950s, they were the best.
customer_reviews.author: Belva Cullison

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving this toaster! It took a few tries for me to find the perfect settings for my personal preferences, but once I did the results have been consistently perfect. Very even toasting on all sizes of bread I’ve tried. The bagel setting is great, too. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Breiling

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: So far no complain, i barely use it but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic Glam

customer_reviews.title: Makes butter toast look great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice classy looking toaster! Bit more expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Just love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Just love this toaster. It fits nicely on the counter if you have space restraints, the toast comes out just perfect and doesn't take forever which is a plus for us. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: touser

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good toaster! Works well and toast fast, unlike the old one we had. Fast delivery as usual and value for your money! We love it so much and it’s a nice addition to the red stuff we have in the kitchen😁😊
customer_reviews.author: Letti

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking AND it works!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how challenging it is to buy a toaster these days. Our last one was 15 years old, but one morning, decided to burn itself and the cabinets above it, up flames. Purchased and returned 5 toasters before getting this one. None of them toasted evenly. This one does what it is suppose to do and it looks as good on the counter as it does in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Best. Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Best.Toaster.Ever. I had a kid who is serious about his toast, so we've tried a lot of toasters. This is nice and heavy weight (doesn't seem cheap). Dials are nice to use. Toast comes out great - there are a lot of functions and a good range to the 'toast level' settings (from light to dark). It's great.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster I've had it in stainless steel for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster I've had it in stainless steel for the past seven years and traded up to the red just because I was changing my kitchen. The previous was the Best toaster l ever had .
customer_reviews.author: dawn i d'amato

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster that I’ve ever had. It’s so easy to work. Looks beautiful & I love the different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what you get for the look
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks great, but does not do bagels. The button does nothing on either side. I have had 2 toasters before with the bagel button and it only toasts one side of the bagel, but this one just burns one side while toasting the other side. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: It took two adults 3-4 minutes to remove the advertisement wrapped around the guide area. This resulted in a scratch down the front of the toaster. The cord does not retract.
customer_reviews.author: dssdss

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and works great
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an earlier version of the same toaster when it just got too old. This is prettier and works great - enough settings but still easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wells

customer_reviews.title: silver toaster was sent not RED, 2 slice not 4,
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toaster twice, both times I ordered it they sent a 2 slice toast in silver not RED, needless to say don't think I'll be ordering a toaster from Amazon warehouse, since seems like they don't know the difference in red and silver or 2 and 4. Not a happy customer. Donna Pressley
customer_reviews.author: D. Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Sexy looking RED toaster
customer_reviews.text: I just love the look of this toaster. Looks so chic on my countertop. Toasts nicely too. Easy slide out crumb tray. It’s a winner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: toasts both sides evenly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toaster, best I have owned and I have owned a few--

customer_reviews.title: Put some bread in .. You have toast
customer_reviews.text: This model exceeded my expectations up arrival. I had looked at models less expensive yet this one stood out for looks, features and benefits. It has slots wide enough for the thickest bagels as it stated and a nice touch is that you can lift up on the handles to push the hot items up a bit to grab them easier. And.... It makes toast. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cormier

customer_reviews.title: great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful toast very crisp cheaper than other retail stores are a great product overall
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, toasts great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this toaster, it's a great retro style look but with shiny accents that work well in a modern setting. Does pretty much what it says on the can in terms of toasting. Big clear dials for toasting level controls that work consistently. I've owned the stainless steel model previously for years and it worked without problem for many years. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AmazinReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Quick toasting
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster, color matches my kitchen, takes long to brown toadt
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very well made nice looking toaster and has some options that make it really nice.....
customer_reviews.author: mr09sporty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Looking, Average Toasting
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking toaster that toasts well provided you don't want well-toasted toast. I don't mean burnt toast, just evenly browned toast. For that I've had to put the setting to the maximum, plus hit the Defrost button (which helps a little). Even then I still re-toast it a bit. The reason I didn't return it is because I don't believe it's easy (any more) to find a toaster that does, in fact, really toast. My gold standard would be those 1930s-1940s toasters that did their job well, in addition to having snappy curvilinear styling.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and color of this toaster, and that it holds four slices of bread but is still quite compact. It browns fairly evenly, and the design of the crumb-catcher makes it easy to clean. The metal loses it's sheen, but still looks decent. It was a bit pricey, but if it continues working as well as it is, then it was probably worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and being about to toast four pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and being about to toast four pieces of bread at one time. It has the option to also just toast one piece in a specified slot.
customer_reviews.author: Lafeesha

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely but Not Like Back in the Day!
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster but these things don't cook toast like they used to. Toasting is almost never consistent from one pair of slices to the other. What's neat about this one is I can toast bagels on one side (lower temperature) and bread on the other. Little splash of red in the kitchen is neat too.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Fox

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dials are dark and hard to read. Dials are loose and a lite bump changes the settings unintentionally.
customer_reviews.author: Pointer

customer_reviews.title: Fastest toaster we have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: The toaster toasts bread very quickly. The metallic red faceplate with chrome sides look great. My wife commented that the inner slices seem to brown slightly more than the outer slices when 4 slices are toasted at once. I never noticed this but I like my toast to look toasted.
customer_reviews.author: George Vasick

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bagels
customer_reviews.text: When toasting bagels, you push a bagel button. This is supposed to make the toasting session longer. It does and it toasts the cut side and burns the outside. On other toasters the bagel button gives the outside half power so everything comes out fine. A piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: BsDulcimer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster to replace one that died. This toaster works great, is easy to use and clean. I love the red!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Dependable, pretty, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Crumb tray easy to use. Looks nice on the counter. I use it for bagels and toast, waffles and French toast.
customer_reviews.author: howdysos

customer_reviews.title: Does my toast the way I like it
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Does the job. Goes with all our other red kitchen gadgets. Previous toasters have required two cycles to toast whole-grain bread. But using the Bagel setting, this one gets it brown in one cycle. Also, it doesn't take as much space as many four-slice toasters.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional toaster
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toaster. The option of 4 slices are perfect for quick breakfasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has many options. Love the 4 slice part also.
customer_reviews.author: moskqq

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Wide slots and you can toast for 2 people at the same time. I chose the red color and it is super cute and vintage looking but with fully modern settings = perfect
customer_reviews.author: Hollyberries

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great. Replaced the silver one I had for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks great. Replaced the silver one I had for a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible toaster. I just started using it. Gave it as a Christmas gift, they returned it to me saying it wouldn't pop up, it burned the toast regardless of what setting it was on. And when you try to retrieve the toast by using the lever, it sticks, it's very hard to maneuver up. I apparently missed my return date by a month. I definitely wouldn't buy this again....NEVER ..NEVER..NEVER. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Power Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality performance and style at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: First time I purchased a color finish other than stainless steel. Very happy with the red finish, brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen W. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and weighty BUT Needs a REAL bagel setting
customer_reviews.text: Bagel setting "adds more time" ?????? There are already 2 dials for that...I need to toast one side of my bagels
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than most toasters
customer_reviews.text: Works better than most toasters, but still toasts a little unevenly. I haven't found a toaster that works well since the 60's.
customer_reviews.author: Leighana

customer_reviews.title: 20 months later... no problems... no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Cuisinart toaster to match coffee brewer and other counter appliances. It has been used 2-3 times a week without a hitch. The browning is uniform on both sides of all four toasting slots. It is a breeze to clean and still looks like new. No regrets here!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: ... am working on getting the right toast that I like but I like the toaster
customer_reviews.text: I am working on getting the right toast that I like but I like the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer linda b

customer_reviews.title: Having a four toast toaster is great in the mornings when you have guests
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a a gift and have even used it several times. Having a four toast toaster is great in the mornings when you have guests. this toaster is not only attractive but works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cruz

customer_reviews.title: 😍 love it❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: It’s so beautiful, like a work of Art on my kitchen counter.works great, love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Bellacicco

customer_reviews.title: Classy toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and the set up of this toaster. That part gets 5 stars. My only problem is one of the two slides sticks and the toast won't go down. With a little maneuvering it does slide down and cooks toast to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: JIB

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves toaster. Makes her job easier. Said she wished she had bought it years ago. Works good. Tom
customer_reviews.author: tom whitley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So great. Love this machine. And looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's sturdy and it has a beautiful metallic red and stainless steel. It toasts everything perfectly as lo g as you have it on the proper setting. I expect to be using this for a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Biblinitch

customer_reviews.title: Love the color❤️ Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Previously owned in the all stainless but gave to son for college. Decided to replace with this gorgeous red. Will by again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A great looking toaster
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived within time frame projected and was packed very good. Bought this as a replacement toaster for my wife's kitchen and also as a Christmas gift. It is great! My wife is very proud of it and has since decided to replace all the kitchen items in red. This thing is beautiful and will brighten anyone's kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dooster

customer_reviews.title: Ours works flawlessly.....
customer_reviews.text: Judging by the reviews of other purchasers - I think it is pot luck whether you get a great toaster or a terrible toaster. We got a magical toaster - it is flawless and looks very, very nice. We have three kids who devour toast/ bagels. Our toasters get a real workout morning and night. 1 week of heavy use and it is perfect so far.......
customer_reviews.author: JW9

customer_reviews.title: nice toaster good price
customer_reviews.text: this toaster works great, in the past i've always bought cheap ones for under $10 but this was a great price and works awsome won't buy the cheap ones ever again you can really adjust the settings well on this one. i'll bet even emerald would like this toaster it's a great toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! It goes great with my Stand Mixer in the same red color. It really brings some color to our kitchen! We absolutely love it and highly recommend it. Toasts perfectly! My boyfriend loves the pull up feature so you do not have to burn your hands getting your english muffins out! He was upset that I paid so much for a toaster but now he is thankful I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews before buying!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster three months ago. So far it toasts beautifully. Nice and even. I like the warm feature and how pretty it looks on my counter. The problem is: the bagel setting does not work. I've debated on replacing it for another but I am reluctant due to so many negative reviews. I might get one thats worse.
customer_reviews.author: nj56

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE TOASTER HAS A VERY CLASSIC APPEARANCE AND ALLOWS US TO TOAST MULTIPLE TYPES OF BREAD OR MUFFINS
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Red
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend who loves the red colour, which was perfect for redesigning of her kitchen. She love it, from he colour to how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Gadhafi242

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work!! And I threw away pkg material because I thought Cuisinart and Amazon were reliable! $70 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Davis

customer_reviews.title: not an investment
customer_reviews.text: only lasted 3 years!!! My parents had a toaster for 35 years!!! Come on, America. Let's offer quality products.
customer_reviews.author: carol j kampstra

customer_reviews.title: Works really good!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced exact model we had before but it silver. Works really good!
customer_reviews.author: E A Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great with bread, bagels and thick frozen waffles with heat setting on 3.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon1950

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: I had one similar previous so I knew it would work well. It was the red color that brought me to purchase this one went the old one went 'on-the=fritz'.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pickell

customer_reviews.title: Additional buttons useless.
customer_reviews.text: The bagel button does nothing. Continues to toast both sides of bagel.
customer_reviews.author: Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster
customer_reviews.text: I just don't see all these issues about uneven toasting... mine is almost perfect once I learned how to set the different controls
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio

customer_reviews.title: We love our new toaster!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect 4-slice toaster!! The browning is even on both sides of bread and the wide slots make for toasting bagels much easier then our older model. Will definitely recommend this to my family and friends...price is reasonable too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect and the color was as described. Great shipping job by Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very fast however, bagel feature doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very fast however, bagel feature doesn't work as described on your website. Both sides of bagel toast always.
customer_reviews.author: john robinson

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CPT-180MRP1 CPT-180MR Classic 4-Slice Toaster, Metallic Red
product_meta.description: Cuisinart Metal Classic Toaster. Cuisinart's Metal Classic Toaster has a smooth brushed stainless housing with polished chrome and black accents. Its custom controls let you defrost and toast bagels and bread -- just the way you want them Press any of the four buttons, bagels, reheat, defrost and cancel, to fit your toasting needs. The browning control sets the desired toast color from light to dark, with six browning levels. Product Features Smooth brushed stainless housing with polished chrome and black accents Custom control: 6-setting browning dials, dual reheat, defrost and bagel buttons with LED indicators 1-1/2-inch wide toasting slots Extra-lift carriage lever Slide-out crumb tray Convenient cord wrap Instruction book Limited 3-year warranty Toasting Tips Toasting is a combination of cooking and drying of the bread. Therefore, differences in moisture level from one bread to another can result in varying toasting times. For slightly dry bread, use a lower setting than you normally would. For very fresh bread or whole wheat bread, use a higher setting than normal. Breads with very uneven surfaces (such as English muffins) will require a higher toast setting. Thickly cut pieces of bread (including bagels) will take longer to toast, sometimes significantly longer, since more moisture must be evaporated from the bread before toasting can occur. Very thick pieces may require two cycles. Cleaning and Maintenance Always allow the toaster to cool completely before cleaning. Do not use abrasive cleansers. Simply wipe the exterior with a clean damp cloth and dry thoroughly. Apply any cleansing agent to a cloth, not to the toaster, before cleaning. To remove crumbs, slide out the crumb tray and discard crumbs. Wipe clean and replace. Never operate the toaster without the crumb tray in place. To remove any pieces of bread remaining in the toaster, turn the toaster upside down and gently shake. Never insert any hard or sharp instruments into the slot, as this could damage the toaster and cause a safety hazard. Never wrap the cord around the outside of the toaster. Use the cord storage cleats on the underside of the toaster. Product Dimensions The Cuisinart 2-Slice Metal Classic Toaster measures approximately 10.75" x 7.13" x 7.13". The 4-Slice Metal Classic Toaster measures approximately 11.88" x 11.06" x 7.00". Warranty The Cuisinart Metal Classic Toaster has a limited 3-year warranty. . Features: Dual control panels make this two toasters in one|Smooth brushed stainless housing with polished chrome and black accents|Custom control: Two 6-setting browning dials dual reheat defrost and bagel buttons with LED indicators|1 1⁄2" - wide toasting slots|Extra-lift carriage lever|Slide-out crumb tray|Convenient cord wrap|Instruction book|Limited 3-year warranty|BPA Free

Custom control: 6-setting browning dials, dual reheat, defrost and bagel buttons with LED indicators
